title: CV
text: If you have trouble visualizing the embeded CV, please click  here to download the pdf file.

title: Mila Victório Pessotto
text: I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Agronomy department at Iowa State University. Most of my research is focused on understanding the effect of cereal rye on corn yield. The goal is to understand the causes of yield drag and how to overcome them. Also,I am studying ways to create a DIY soil health manual to facilitate the soil health assessment for farmers.

title: Mila Victório Pessotto
text: I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Agronomy department at Iowa State University. Most of my research is focused on understanding the effect of cereal rye on corn yield. The goal is to understand the causes of yield drag and how to overcome them. Also,I am studying ways to create a DIY soil health manual to facilitate the soil health assessment for farmers.

title: Mila Victório Pessotto
text:
Research interests
There are several research areas that fascinate me. A short list of those would be: soil health, cover crops, soil fertility, and sustainable production systems.
